title: @Riot ban the 4 people in my last game who surrendered as we were ending the game.
body:
I sat through a full game of lag spikes, making sure I didn't feed much and making sure I made a good contribution to the team and then my 4 troll teammates (who were incredibly toxic and were ignoring me) surrendered as we were taking down the enemy nexus.

I want them to be help accountable for me getting less IP than I earned, and *far* less mastery points than I earned for my performance (I was S- so I would have gained ~1000 instead of a measly 200-and-something).

replies.body: majority rule, if they felt they weren't going to win then so be it.

this was a normal right? This shit happens all the time.
better get super serious for casual modes.
